inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getResourceTags.

resourceId.description: ID of the resource with the tags to list. See details below.

tags.description: Map of key=value pairs for each tag set on the resource.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getResourceTags.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

tags.description: Map of key=value pairs for each tag set on the resource.
